en: go without stopping at a first supposed destination

ngiemboon: À zǎb ngie à ge gʉa.
en: He has decided that he is going to leave.

ngiemboon: Múɔ wɔɔn giŋ pɔ́ páʼ nzǎʼ ngě la.
en: This child walks like an idle person.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à fǎŋ, giŋ pɔ́ nzaza.
en: The one who is fat walks heavily.

ngiemboon: Tâm gyǎ tsɔ̌ nzàʼ pà nɔ̀ɔn wá á gẅiin mendóŋ twó yé méntá.
en: Tam saw a strange animal that had three horns on its head.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gyǎ tsɔ̌ nzàʼ pà nɔ̀ɔn á gẅiin mekwò ntɔgɔ́.
en: I saw an extraordinary animal with six legs.
decide to act badly on someone
